channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Brakeman Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Brakeman Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2122|2024-08-04T07:01:40.665Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20brakeman%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Brakeman Plugin 0.12 and earlier did not escape values received from parsed JSON files when rendering them, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exploitable by users able to control the Brakeman post-build step input data.
